main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified flying objects over Mojave, California, on November 7, 1951.
interesting points: The object was reported to be emitting a bright blue-white glow and moved erratically, climbing to high altitudes before disappearing., Several witnesses reported similar sightings of circular objects hovering and then moving at high speeds., One witness described an object approximately 30 feet in diameter that hovered before accelerating rapidly., The weather conditions were clear, aiding visibility for the witnesses., The report was filed with the Deputy Sheriff's Office and described the witnesses as reliable individuals.
sighted object: Unidentified flying objects, described as circular and emitting bright light
witness description: A resident of Mojave who reported observing a bright light in the sky.
